gunapalawa ma eetharam norissuwe ohu pahath kule ekek nisamada…ma nodanimaohuta ma aakarshanaya wi ara midi kanna bari wu nariya wage mage mannaya nisa eya kiya ganna ho pita karaganna bariwa mata athi wi thibu aathathiya nisada…nathahoth, biththi hatharakata kotu wi eekakari jiwithayak gatha karana ma nidahase thaman kamathi paridi jiwath wana ohuwa dakiddi mata thibunu irisiyawada kiya mata notherini…kese namuth sidu wu me deyin eya tharamak maga ari athi bawath mata danini…aaaaahhh…aththamada?…meyin wena palawipayath issarahata umbaa windapan ehenan’ ee mage yati sithayi…ma me deta polombawa kuprakamawa wathawaranaya salasu mage ‘sitha’ hisa pahath karagena sitiye…eyin kalpanawata watunu ma waha nagita mage diya redda othagena nawathath lindata diwwe asala hiti gunapalage muhunawath nobalaya.
